short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ayah a Day is a browser extension that displays an Ayah in your browser to help cultivate a daily Quran habit!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab, a new Quran verse. The browser extension display a new verse every day with the link to the audio, translation, and more!
